and that's a lot of money you know most places go ahead and just you know put it into your mortgage payment so you don't forget about it at the last minute you know and have to come up with the funds at the end of the year
because i mean part of the reason part of the incentives of moving to Texas from Virginia was the fact that you have no state tax and basically it adds about sixty dollars to your paycheck
you know just i mean itself would probably add up to seven or eight thousand dollars a year
on two of our cars and they paid like a couple hundred dollars on the other cars but the personal property tax itself used to add up
